Description: Sherd of pottery transport amphora; shoulder and part of strap handle; medium-coarse non-micaceous orown-buff clay with grey core. Inscribed.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), Stratum AΠ145 [according to BM register]
Curator's comments: M. Pesenti suggests Klazomenian, but there are no traces of the expected painted bands. A local Egyptian origin may be more likely.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JA.083)
